## AlBehaviorPromise.then() method

Attaches a resolve/reject listener to the underlying promise.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
then<TResult1 = ResultType, TResult2 = never>(callback?: ((value: ResultType) => TResult1 | PromiseLike<TResult1>) | undefined | null, error?: ((reason: any) => TResult2 | PromiseLike<TResult2>) | undefined | null): Promise<TResult1 | TResult2>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | <code>((value: ResultType) =&gt; TResult1 &#124; PromiseLike&lt;TResult1&gt;) &#124; undefined &#124; null</code> |  |
|  error | <code>((reason: any) =&gt; TResult2 &#124; PromiseLike&lt;TResult2&gt;) &#124; undefined &#124; null</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<TResult1 | TResult2>`
